title: Nowhere to Hide
description: Stephanie Carovella came back to Los Angeles to face her past and nearly lost her future to a serial killer.Now she has a chance to start a new life with a new man.But is that what she wants? While she battles Jase Devlin, the man who won't stop until they are together, she gains the attention of another serial killer.This time it's a copycat killer; one who will stop at nothing to possess her.Can she survive the madness of another killer? Will she give in to Jase Devlin's advances? And will she see the real threat before it's too late?Or will Stephanie Carovella discover she has Nowhere To Hide?
author: Nina D'Angelo
